long_description: The REI Quantum Shoulder bag fits small laptops and features a TSA checkpoint-friendly design. It provides convenience, protection, organization and comfort for commuters, students and professionals. Fits most 13 - 14 in. laptops and is designed to be TSA checkpoint-friendly: dedicated rear pocket opens flat to allow laptop to remain inside during security screening. Rear pocket also includes a sleeve that will hold a tablet separate from your laptop. Main compartment is sized to carry letter-size documents and file folders. Fully featured front organizer pocket holds pens, electronics and small essentials; key clip. Fully padded side zipper pocket keeps smaller belongings protected and accessible. Mesh side pocket expands to varying sizes and fits up to 1-liter water bottles. Shoulder strap offers sliding shoulder pad and easy length adjustments, and is removable; top carry handle. Cordura(R) nylon fabric offers superior abrasion resistance and tear strength; fabric is coated for water resistance and durability. Reflective trim enhances visibility in dusk/dark conditions; web loop holds blinky light (sold separately).
short_description: The REI Quantum Shoulder bag fits small laptops and features a TSA checkpoint-friendly design. It provides convenience, protection, organization and comfort for commuters, students and professionals.
